channel.title: Cache - Compatible with Galkon's Refactored + Peter's Map Editor
channel.description:
Hi,
Is there a cache that is compatible with both Galkon's Refactored client [b]and[/b] Peter's map editor? Or if there is not, can someone direct me to making the cache in Galkon's client compatible with the map editors? It would be legit if I could get one.
EDIT: I've searched and read of a possible solution where you can use Tom's cache editor to extract map files from and to the caches. If so, which cache parts?
Thanks, Whac

item.title: Cache - Compatible with Galkon's Refactored + Peter's Map Editor
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
